articles.title: ‘Impossible’ breakthrough sees scientists successfully regrow optic nerve cells - RT
articles.description: Scientists have successfully regenerated damaged optic nerve cells from mice by stimulating production of a certain protein, providing hope for breakthrough treatments of numerous human eye diseases.
